name: Console Lemonade Stand
desc: A recreation of the classic Apple II Lemonade Stand game in C++. Features randomized events, support for multiple players, and even an RPG minigame!

name: CUDA Particle Engine
desc: A major multi-year research project focused on building a real-time particle engine. The engine utilizes GPU acceleration through C++ and CUDA, allowing for large amounts of parallel processing. The program ran on an Nvidia RTX Titan to drive 100000 air particles.
